creator: Sidney
descriptionHtml:
BAC Calculator and drink monitoring

The goal of MyPromille is to give awareness about the combination between drinking and driving. MyPromille tracks your alcohol consumption and calculates your blood alcohol content (BAC). Don't use this app to determine if you are able to drive or not!

With the user info (gender, weight, age...) we can approximate the BAC. The formula (from in a scientific study of Biomed Central) that we use is mathematically and theoretically correct but it can be different when comparing with a breathalyser.

When tracking your drinks, MyPromille is showing your current BAC and gives you an indication when your BAC is lower than the legal limit so you can drive again.

MyPromille has the option to
- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…)
- Show the current BAC
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the legal country limit
- Search in a database for types of beers and provides some info about the beer type
- Show your friends that are online and also tracking their drinks

MyPromille is supporting metric units. Imperial units will be supported in the future. The drinks are displayed in cl and the percentage of alcohol in ‰.
We support different languages: English, Dutch, French, Portuguese. Countries where the drinking limit is included in the app: Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Luxembourg, United Kingdom, Switzerland, Brazil.

title: MyPromille - Alcohol Calculator

creator: Sidney
descriptionHtml:
BAC Calculator and drink monitoring

The goal of MyPromille is to give awareness about the combination between drinking and driving. MyPromille tracks your alcohol consumption and calculates your blood alcohol content (BAC). Don't use this app to determine if you are able to drive or not!

With the user info (gender, weight, age...) we can approximate the BAC. The formula (from in a scientific study of Biomed Central) that we use is mathematically and theoretically correct but it can be different when comparing with a breathalyser.

When tracking your drinks, MyPromille is showing your current BAC and gives you an indication when your BAC is lower than the legal limit so you can drive again.

MyPromille has the option to
- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…)
- Show the current BAC
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the legal country limit
- Search in a database for types of beers and provides some info about the beer type
- Show your friends that are online and also tracking their drinks

MyPromille is supporting metric units. Imperial units will be supported in the future. The drinks are displayed in cl and the percentage of alcohol in ‰.
We support different languages: English, Dutch, French, Portuguese. Countries where the drinking limit is included in the app: Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Luxembourg, United Kingdom, Switzerland, Brazil.

BAC Calculator and drink monitoring

The goal of MyPromille is to give awareness about the combination between drinking and driving. MyPromille tracks your alcohol consumption and calculates your blood alcohol content (BAC). Don't use this app to determine if you are able to drive or not!

With the user info (gender, weight, age...) we can approximate the BAC. The formula (from in a scientific study of Biomed Central) that we use is mathematically and theoretically correct but it can be different when comparing with a breathalyser.

When tracking your drinks, MyPromille is showing your current BAC and gives you an indication when your BAC is lower than the legal limit so you can drive again.

MyPromille has the option to
- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…)
- Show the current BAC
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the legal country limit
- Search in a database for types of beers and provides some info about the beer type
- Show your friends that are online and also tracking their drinks

MyPromille is supporting metric units. Imperial units will be supported in the future. The drinks are displayed in cl and the percentage of alcohol in ‰.
We support different languages: English, Dutch, French, Portuguese. Countries where the drinking limit is included in the app: Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Luxembourg, United Kingdom, Switzerland, Brazil.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: MyPromille is constantly working to improve your experience and help you beat yesterday. This version includes bug fixes to improve the user experience.

title: MyPromille - Alcohol Calculator

creator: Sidney
descriptionHtml:
Blood Alcohol Content (BAC) calculator app.

MyPromille mobile application wants to give insight in the blood alcohol content (BAC) when drinking alcohol beverages. MyPromille wants to give awareness by estimating the alcohol level inside the body while consuming alcohol .

Based on the information provided by the user (gender and weight) MyPromille calculates the amount of alcohol in your blood using a formula developed by a Swedish professor named Erik Widmark(1920). The real blood alcohol content varies from person to person according to their metabolism, this app is only providing estimative, it does not mean the real value, use with caution.

The calculation of the app is based on different variables: weight, gender, drink type (amount of alcohol and percentage) and time of the consumption. After the calculation the current BAC is displayed on the screen, the level goes down automatically by the progression of the time. There is also a time indication when the persons alcohol content is again equal to (or lower then) the desired limit (Configurable by the user).

MyPromille has the options to

- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…);
- Show the current alcohol level content (BAC);
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the level defined by the user;
- Search using untappd for types and labels of beers;

MyPromille is supporting metric and Imperial units. The drinks are displayed in cl, ml, oz , the alcohol level in ‰ (permille) and % (percent) based on user preference.

Be aware that this app is only giving an estimation based on a formula and has no legal value, It has no intention to replace a breathalyser. This application is not meant to be used, nor should be used to diagnose the real BAC as a breathalyser. The publisher of MyPromille is not legally responsible of the acts of the user.

MyPromille mobile application wants to give insight in the blood alcohol content (BAC) when drinking alcohol beverages. MyPromille wants to give awareness by estimating the alcohol level inside the body while consuming alcohol .

Based on the information provided by the user (gender and weight) MyPromille calculates the amount of alcohol in your blood using a formula developed by a Swedish professor named Erik Widmark(1920). The real blood alcohol content varies from person to person according to their metabolism, this app is only providing estimative, it does not mean the real value, use with caution.

The calculation of the app is based on different variables: weight, gender, drink type (amount of alcohol and percentage) and time of the consumption. After the calculation the current BAC is displayed on the screen, the level goes down automatically by the progression of the time. There is also a time indication when the persons alcohol content is again equal to (or lower then) the desired limit (Configurable by the user).

MyPromille has the options to

- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…);
- Show the current alcohol level content (BAC);
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the level defined by the user;
- Search using untappd for types and labels of beers;

MyPromille is supporting metric and Imperial units. The drinks are displayed in cl, ml, oz , the alcohol level in ‰ (permille) and % (percent) based on user preference.

Be aware that this app is only giving an estimation based on a formula and has no legal value, It has no intention to replace a breathalyser. This application is not meant to be used, nor should be used to diagnose the real BAC as a breathalyser. The publisher of MyPromille is not legally responsible of the acts of the user.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: MyPromille is constantly working to improve your experience and help you beat yesterday.This version includes bug fixes to improve the user experience.

title: MyPromille -Alcohol Calculator

creator: Sidney
descriptionHtml:
Blood Alcohol Content (BAC) calculator app.

MyPromille mobile application wants to give insight in the blood alcohol content (BAC) when drinking alcohol beverages. MyPromille wants to give awareness by estimating the alcohol level inside the body while consuming alcohol .

Based on the information provided by the user (gender and weight) MyPromille calculates the amount of alcohol in your blood using a formula developed by a Swedish professor named Erik Widmark(1920). The real blood alcohol content varies from person to person according to their metabolism, this app is only providing estimative, it does not mean the real value, use with caution.

The calculation of the app is based on different variables: weight, gender, drink type (amount of alcohol and percentage) and time of the consumption. After the calculation the current BAC is displayed on the screen, the level goes down automatically by the progression of the time. There is also a time indication when the persons alcohol content is again equal to (or lower then) the desired limit (Configurable by the user).

MyPromille has the options to

- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…);
- Show the current alcohol level content (BAC);
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the level defined by the user;
- Search using untappd for types and labels of beers;
- Compare your consumption behaviour with other users

MyPromille is supporting metric and Imperial units. The drinks are displayed in cl, ml, oz , the alcohol level in ‰ (permille) and % (percent) based on user preference.

Be aware that this app is only giving an estimation based on a formula and has no legal value, It has no intention to replace a breathalyser. This application is not meant to be used, nor should be used to diagnose the real BAC as a breathalyser. The publisher of MyPromille is not legally responsible of the acts of the user.

The real blood alcohol content varies from person to person according to their metabolism, this app is only providing estimative, it does not mean the real value, use with caution.

The calculation of the app is based on different variables: weight, gender, drink type (amount of alcohol and percentage) and time of the consumption. After the calculation the current BAC is displayed on the screen, the level goes down automatically by the progression of the time. There is also a time indication when the persons alcohol content is again equal to (or lower then) the desired limit (Configurable by the user).

MyPromille has the options to

- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…);
- Show the current alcohol level content (BAC);
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the level defined by the user;
- Search using untappd for types and labels of beers;
- Compare your consumption behaviour with other users

MyPromille is supporting metric and Imperial units. The drinks are displayed in cl, ml, oz , the alcohol level in ‰ (permille) and % (percent) based on user preference.

Be aware that this app is only giving an estimation based on a formula and has no legal value, It has no intention to replace a breathalyser. This application is not meant to be used, nor should be used to diagnose the real BAC as a breathalyser. The publisher of MyPromille is not legally responsible of the acts of the user.

MyPromille mobile application wants to give insight in the blood alcohol content (BAC) when drinking alcohol beverages. MyPromille wants to give awareness by estimating the alcohol level inside the body while consuming alcohol .

Based on the information provided by the user (gender and weight) MyPromille calculates the amount of alcohol in your blood using a formula developed by a Swedish professor named Erik Widmark(1920). The real blood alcohol content varies from person to person according to their metabolism, this app is only providing estimative, it does not mean the real value, use with caution.

The calculation of the app is based on different variables: weight, gender, drink type (amount of alcohol and percentage) and time of the consumption. After the calculation the current BAC is displayed on the screen, the level goes down automatically by the progression of the time. There is also a time indication when the persons alcohol content is again equal to (or lower then) the desired limit (Configurable by the user).

MyPromille has the options to

- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…);
- Show the current alcohol level content (BAC);
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the level defined by the user;
- Search using untappd for types and labels of beers;
- Compare your consumption behaviour with other users

MyPromille is supporting metric and Imperial units. The drinks are displayed in cl, ml, oz , the alcohol level in ‰ (permille) and % (percent) based on user preference.

Be aware that this app is only giving an estimation based on a formula and has no legal value, It has no intention to replace a breathalyser. This application is not meant to be used, nor should be used to diagnose the real BAC as a breathalyser. The publisher of MyPromille is not legally responsible of the acts of the user.

title: MyPromille -Alcohol Calculator

creator: Sidney
descriptionHtml:
Blood Alcohol Content (BAC) calculator app.

MyPromille mobile application wants to give insight in the blood alcohol content (BAC) when drinking alcohol beverages. MyPromille wants to give awareness by estimating the alcohol level inside the body while consuming alcohol .

Based on the information provided by the user (gender and weight) MyPromille calculates the amount of alcohol in your blood using a formula developed by a Swedish professor named Erik Widmark(1920). The real blood alcohol content varies from person to person according to their metabolism, this app is only providing estimative, it does not mean the real value, use with caution.

The calculation of the app is based on different variables: weight, gender, drink type (amount of alcohol and percentage) and time of the consumption. After the calculation the current BAC is displayed on the screen, the level goes down automatically by the progression of the time. There is also a time indication when the persons alcohol content is again equal to (or lower then) the desired limit (Configurable by the user).

MyPromille has the options to

- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…);
- Show the current alcohol level content (BAC);
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the level defined by the user;
- Search using untappd for types and labels of beers;
- Compare your consumption behaviour with other users

MyPromille is supporting metric and Imperial units. The drinks are displayed in cl, ml, oz , the alcohol level in ‰ (permille) and % (percent) based on user preference.

Be aware that this app is only giving an estimation based on a formula and has no legal value, It has no intention to replace a breathalyser. This application is not meant to be used, nor should be used to diagnose the real BAC as a breathalyser. The publisher of MyPromille is not legally responsible of the acts of the user.

MyPromille mobile application wants to give insight in the blood alcohol content (BAC) when drinking alcohol beverages. MyPromille wants to give awareness by estimating the alcohol level inside the body while consuming alcohol .

Based on the information provided by the user (gender and weight) MyPromille calculates the amount of alcohol in your blood using a formula developed by a Swedish professor named Erik Widmark(1920). The real blood alcohol content varies from person to person according to their metabolism, this app is only providing estimative, it does not mean the real value, use with caution.

The calculation of the app is based on different variables: weight, gender, drink type (amount of alcohol and percentage) and time of the consumption. After the calculation the current BAC is displayed on the screen, the level goes down automatically by the progression of the time. There is also a time indication when the persons alcohol content is again equal to (or lower then) the desired limit (Configurable by the user).

MyPromille has the options to

- Track your drinks (beer, wine, cocktails…);
- Show the current alcohol level content (BAC);
- Show a timestamp when the BAC is below the level defined by the user;
- Search using untappd for types and labels of beers;
- Compare your consumption behaviour with other users

MyPromille is supporting metric and Imperial units. The drinks are displayed in cl, ml, oz , the alcohol level in ‰ (permille) and % (percent) based on user preference.

Be aware that this app is only giving an estimation based on a formula and has no legal value, It has no intention to replace a breathalyser. This application is not meant to be used, nor should be used to diagnose the real BAC as a breathalyser. The publisher of MyPromille is not legally responsible of the acts of the user.
